import React,{Fragment,useState,useEffect} from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import Button from '../Button'; import {Link,withRouter} from 'react-router-dom'; import {connect} from 'react-redux'; import {createprofile,getCurrentProfile} from '../../actions/profile'; const EditProfile = ({profile:{profile,loading},createprofile,getCurrentProfile,history}) => { const [formdata,setformdata] = useState({ profession:'', workplace:'', location:'', journals:'', bio:'', facebook:'', instagram:'', twitter:'', linkedin:'', youtube:'', isscholar:false }); const [showsocial,togglesocial] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { getCurrentProfile(); setformdata({ profession:loading || !profile.profession ? '' : profile.profession, workplace:loading || !profile.workplace ? '' : profile.workplace, location:loading || !profile.location ? '' : profile.location, journals:loading || !profile.profession ? '' : profile.journals, bio:loading || !profile.bio ? '' : profile.bio, facebook:loading || !profile.social.facebook ? '' : profile.social.facebook, instagram:loading || !profile.social.instagram ? '' : profile.social.instagram, linkedin:loading || !profile.social.linkedin ? '' : profile.social.twitter, youtube:loading || !profile.social.youtube ? '' : profile.social.youtube, twitter:loading || !profile.social.twitter ? '' : profile.social.twitter, isscholar:loading ? '' : profile.isscholar, }) },[loading]) const { profession, workplace, location, journals, bio, facebook, instagram, twitter, linkedin, youtube, isscholar } = formdata; const onChange = (e) => (setformdata({...formdata,[e.target.name]:e.target.value})); const onChangeIsScholar = (e) => (setformdata({...formdata,isscholar:!isscholar})); const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); createprofile(formdata,history,true); } let Sociallinks = null; if(showsocial){ Sociallinks =
onChange(e)} value={twitter}/>
onChange(e)} value={facebook}/>
onChange(e)} value={youtube}/>
onChange(e)} value={linkedin}/>
onChange(e)} value={instagram}/>
; } return (

Create Your Profile

Let's get some information to make your profile stand out

* = required field
onSubmit(e)}>
onChange(e)} value={profession}/> * I hnathawh lai mek tah hian hian ziak rawh
Research scholar i nih leh nih loh tik rawh: {" "} onChangeIsScholar(e)} value={isscholar}/> * Scholar i nih leh nih loh tick rawh(Research ti lai mek ni lo,hna dang thawk tawh tan pawh tick tho tur)
onChange(e)} value={workplace}/> Nangma company pawh ni se ziak tho rawh,student/research bei mek tan chuan education form ah a hranin in ziak dawn nia
onChange(e)} value={location}/> City & state suggested (eg. Aizawl, Mumbai)
onChange(e)} value={journals}/> Research paper emaw journal i publish na website link tah hian dah rawh.Please use comma separated values (eg. www.ieee.org,www.facebook.com)
I chungchang tlem han sawi la :)
Optional
{Sociallinks}
) } EditProfile.propTypes = { createprofile:PropTypes.func.isRequired, getCurrentProfile:PropTypes.func.isRequired, profile:PropTypes.object.isRequired, } const maptoprops = state => ({ profile:state.profile }) export default connect(maptoprops,{createprofile,getCurrentProfile})(withRouter(EditProfile));
